name: Who'sThatPokemon(Unofficial)
0:
”Alexa open Unofficial Pokemon Guessing Game”
”Alexa start Unofficial Pokemon Guessing Game”
”Alexa play Unofficial Pokemon Guessing Game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: unofficial pokemon guessing game
des:
Who's That Pokemon (Unofficial) is a question and answer trivia game. You'll be asked to identify the Pokemon based on their silhouette (on Echo Show and Echo Spot devices) and their Pokedex description, type, and cry (on all devices). 

Easy Mode will quiz you on the original 151 Pokemon, but if you're a Pokemon superfan, Hard Mode is a tougher challenge that includes all 890 current Pokemon.

Stuck? Ask for a hint! You can hear the Pokemon's type or hear what its cry sounds like for a little extra help. You can also repeat the Pokedex description by saying "Pokedex."

Really stuck? You can say, "I don't know" to hear the correct answer, or "Skip" to move on to the next Pokemon 

For the full experience, try Who's That Pokemon (Unofficial) on a device with a screen, where you'll see the blacked-out image of the Pokemon - just like during the anime's commercial breaks!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
